column5: Hey guys, lookin to get out for a fish tomorrow. Would love to hit St. Johns for pike, but unsure of ice conditions. Wondering if it's worth it, or if I should go back to the Minden region for some bows. I found a healthy 7" of ice in that region. But I would love to get into some pike.  Thanks in advance, tight lines
The warm and rain didn't reek havoc up there?
One day of 8 then plumit to minus 8. No.
If anything bring your cleats, lol.Â  I wouldn't worry about thickness but it's probably an ice rink as of today.
